testCases.label: Verify GET endpoint correctly returns path variable
testCases.description: Sends a GET request with a path variable and verifies that the controller returns a 200 OK status along with the expected path variable value in the response body.

testCases.label: Verify POST endpoint returns submitted JSON object
testCases.description: Sends a POST request with a JSON request body and checks that the controller returns a 200 OK response along with the same JSON object in the response body.
